pyNote: By utilizing this file, you agree that the file and the contents are confidential and are provided solely for use with Pegasystems applications and products. Information in this file may have been generated by artificial intelligence and should be validated by a human prior to use. This file is provided as is.
pyDescription: Blueprint from BP-127169 -- Connect and automate work across people and systems to resolve member and provider inquiries faster. Empower healthcare agents with AI-powered task suggestions, coaching, content, and a full, relevant customer view across all channels but with a focus on self service. Future-proof your contact center with industry-leading AI and automation capabilities for efficient, consistent, and personalized service.

pyDADInfo.pyDescription: Connect and automate work across people and systems to resolve member and provider inquiries faster. Empower healthcare agents with AI-powered task suggestions, coaching, content, and a full, relevant customer view across all channels but with a focus on self service. Future-proof your contact center with industry-leading AI and automation capabilities for efficient, consistent, and personalized service.

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Member Eligibility Verification ensures that the member's coverage is active and valid, allowing for accurate processing of inquiries and claims. It involves verifying the member's demographic information, coverage details, and benefits to determine eligibility for services.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Member Eligibility Verification ensures that the member's coverage is active and valid, allowing for accurate processing of inquiries and claims. It involves verifying the member's demographic information, coverage details, and benefits to determine eligibility for services.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The date of birth of the member to validate age and identity.
The member's first name as per their insurance records.
The member's unique identifier, such as a member ID or policy number, which is used to look up the member's eligibility information.
The member's last name as per their insurance records.
The member's contact phone number for communication and verification purposes.
Any additional notes or comments related to the eligibility verification request.
The provider's unique identifier, such as a provider ID or NPI, used to look up provider details for service eligibility.
The name of the provider or facility where the service is being sought.
The type of service being requested, such as medical, dental, vision, etc.
The reason for the eligibility verification request, such as new patient, change in coverage, or specific service inquiry.

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Capture member's demographic information, coverage details, and benefits

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Retrieve member's demographic details from the system
Validate member's coverage details in the system
Determine member's eligibility for benefits

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Validate member's eligibility for services

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assess if member's coverage is currently active
Assess if member's coverage is valid for the services
Assess if member is eligible for the requested services
Assign task to member services for further action

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Review and approve member's eligibility for services

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Authorize member's eligibility for the requested services
Assess if additional information is needed for approval
Inform member about the status of their eligibility

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Process the member's request for services

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assign the service request to the appropriate department
Automatically update member's record with approved services
Inform the provider about the approved services

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Finalize the member's eligibility verification and close the case

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automatically complete the documentation for the verified eligibility
Authorize final approval for the verified eligibility
Inform member services about the finalized eligibility

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Prior Authorization Management involves the review and approval process for medical services or procedures that require pre-approval. This case type ensures that the necessary authorizations are obtained before services are rendered, preventing claim denials and delays.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Prior Authorization Management involves the review and approval process for medical services or procedures that require pre-approval. This case type ensures that the necessary authorizations are obtained before services are rendered, preventing claim denials and delays.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The Member ID of the patient requiring prior authorization. This field stores the unique identifier for the member and is used to link the prior authorization request to the patient's information.
The name of the patient requiring the prior authorization. This field stores the full name of the patient for whom the prior authorization is being requested.
The date when the prior authorization request was submitted. This field captures the date on which the request for authorization of medical services or procedures was initiated.
The medical service or procedure for which prior authorization is being requested. This field stores the description of the specific medical service or procedure requiring approval.
Additional notes or comments related to the prior authorization request. This field allows users to provide supplementary information or clarifications regarding the authorization request.
The unique reference number assigned to the prior authorization request. This field captures the identifier associated with the specific prior authorization request.

The diagnosis or medical condition justifying the need for the requested service or procedure. This field captures the medical diagnosis or condition for which the requested service or procedure is necessary.
The date and time when the prior authorization request was last updated. This field captures the timestamp of the most recent update to the prior authorization request.
The status of the prior authorization request. This field indicates the current stage or status of the prior authorization process (e.g., pending, approved, denied).
The healthcare provider or facility requesting the prior authorization. This field stores the name of the healthcare provider or facility submitting the request for prior authorization.

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Capture necessary information for prior authorization

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Gather patient information for authorization review
Validate patient's insurance coverage for the requested service
Assess if the medical service or procedure requires prior authorization
Determine if the requested service is within the provider network
Automatically fetch the member's eligibility status for the requested service

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Evaluate and process the prior authorization request

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assess the patient's medical records for the requested service
Approve or reject the prior authorization request based on medical necessity
Determine if more details are needed for the authorization decision
Inform the healthcare provider of the prior authorization decision

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Handle claims after prior authorization approval

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Initiate the claim processing for the authorized medical service
Automatically adjust member benefits based on the authorized service
Inform the member about the status of the processed claim

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Handle appeals for denied prior authorizations

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assess the appeal request for a denied prior authorization
Check if additional information has been submitted for the appeal
Authorize or reject the appeal based on the provided information

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Conclude the prior authorization process

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Finalize and close the prior authorization case
Inform the member about the final decision on the prior authorization

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Provider Network Management focuses on the maintenance and expansion of the network of healthcare providers. It involves credentialing, contracting, and onboarding providers to ensure that members have access to a comprehensive network of high-quality healthcare professionals.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Provider Network Management focuses on the maintenance and expansion of the network of healthcare providers. It involves credentialing, contracting, and onboarding providers to ensure that members have access to a comprehensive network of high-quality healthcare professionals.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The unique identifier for the healthcare provider within the network. This may be an alphanumeric code or a unique number assigned to each provider.
The location where the healthcare provider operates, including address, city, state, and zip code.
The legal name of the healthcare provider or the provider organization within the network.
The type of healthcare provider, such as hospital, clinic, physician, specialist, or facility.
The email address for the healthcare provider's primary point of contact, which may be used for communications related to network management.
The contact person's name for the healthcare provider, who may be the primary point of contact for network management activities.
The phone number for the healthcare provider's primary point of contact, which may be used for communications related to network management.
The date when the current contract or credentialing period for the healthcare provider is set to expire.
The date when the healthcare provider was first contracted or credentialed to be part of the network.
The amount of reimbursement or payment negotiated for services provided by the healthcare provider, typically specified in the contract.

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Capture necessary information for provider network management

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Retrieve provider data from external systems
Assign task to collect credentialing documents from providers
Assess if provider credentials meet the required standards
Assign task to negotiate contracts with providers
Route contract for approval by authorized personnel

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Verify and validate provider credentials

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automatically verify the validity of provider licenses
Assess results of provider background checks
Assign task to request additional documents from providers if needed
Route credentialing decision for approval by authorized personnel
Inform provider of credentialing decision

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Negotiate and finalize contracts with providers

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assign task to review contract terms with legal team
Assess and negotiate provider reimbursement rates
Route contract for final approval by authorized personnel
Automatically generate contract documents for execution
Inform provider of finalized contract details

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Onboard providers into the network

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assign task to conduct orientation for new providers
Automatically set up provider profiles in the network system
Inform internal teams about new provider additions
Assign task to verify provider readiness to start seeing patients
Route provider onboarding for final approval by authorized personnel

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Expand and grow the provider network

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automatically analyze gaps in the provider network
Assess and identify target areas for provider network expansion
Assign task to recruit new providers in target areas
Route contract negotiation for new providers for approval
Inform relevant teams about the network expansion progress

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Conclusion of provider network management

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assess the performance and impact of the network management process
Automatically generate a report on the network performance
Route the final review of the provider network management process

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Healthcare Inquiry Resolution handles member and provider inquiries, issues, and complaints. It includes tracking, investigating, and resolving inquiries related to coverage, claims, benefits, and general healthcare information, ensuring high-quality customer service and satisfaction.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Healthcare Inquiry Resolution handles member and provider inquiries, issues, and complaints. It includes tracking, investigating, and resolving inquiries related to coverage, claims, benefits, and general healthcare information, ensuring high-quality customer service and satisfaction.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The type of inquiry, such as coverage, claims, benefits, or general healthcare information. This field categorizes the nature of the inquiry for tracking and resolution purposes.
The Member ID associated with the inquiry. This field stores the unique identifier for the member making the inquiry.
The Provider ID associated with the inquiry. This field stores the unique identifier for the healthcare provider related to the inquiry.
The date and time the inquiry was received by the healthcare insurance organization. This field captures the timestamp for tracking and response time metrics.
A brief summary of the inquiry or issue raised by the member or provider. This field provides a quick overview of the main concern for easy reference.
The specific department or team responsible for handling the inquiry. This field assigns the inquiry to the relevant internal unit for resolution.
The contact method through which the inquiry was received, such as phone, email, or web form. This field captures the channel used by the member or provider to submit the inquiry.
The detailed description of the inquiry or issue provided by the member or provider. This field contains comprehensive information to aid in investigation and resolution.
The priority level assigned to the inquiry, indicating its urgency and importance. This field helps in prioritizing and managing the resolution process.
The current status of the inquiry, such as open, in progress, or resolved. This field tracks the current stage of resolution for the inquiry.

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Capture necessary information to initiate the inquiry resolution process

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Collect member's personal and policy details for inquiry resolution
Gather specific details of the inquiry from the member or provider
Assess if the inquiry requires urgent attention
Determine if more information is required to proceed with the resolution

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Conduct thorough investigation to understand and analyze the inquiry details

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Review member's historical data to identify patterns or recurring issues
Automatically fetch relevant claim details for the inquiry
Evaluate the validity of the inquiry based on available data
Reach out to the provider for additional information or clarification

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Develop a proposal to resolve the inquiry based on the investigation

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Determine if the member is entitled to the claim based on policy and coverage
Assess if a response from the provider is necessary to proceed
Present the proposed resolution to the member for review and acceptance
Authorize the proposed resolution for implementation

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Execute the approved resolution to address the inquiry effectively

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automatically update member's policy based on the approved resolution
Inform the member about the approved resolution and its implementation
Send notification to the provider regarding the resolution outcome
Automatically update the claim status based on the resolution

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Finalize the inquiry resolution process and ensure all necessary actions are completed

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Document all details of the resolved inquiry for future reference
Send notification to all involved parties about the closure of the inquiry
Automatically archive all case data for record-keeping and audit purposes

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Care Coordination facilitates the coordination of care for members with complex or chronic conditions. It involves collaboration among healthcare providers, case managers, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless and effective delivery of healthcare services, leading to improved patient outcomes and satisfaction.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Care Coordination facilitates the coordination of care for members with complex or chronic conditions. It involves collaboration among healthcare providers, case managers, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless and effective delivery of healthcare services, leading to improved patient outcomes and satisfaction.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: Unique Member Identifier - A unique alphanumeric code assigned to each member for identification and tracking purposes.
Member Name - The full name of the member receiving care coordination services.
Provider Name - The name of the healthcare provider responsible for the member's care.
Date of Referral - The date when the member was referred for care coordination services.
Care Coordinator - The name of the assigned care coordinator responsible for managing the member's care.
Care Plan - The detailed plan outlining the coordinated healthcare services and interventions for the member.
Care Team - The names and roles of the healthcare professionals involved in the member's care coordination.
Communication Log - A log of all communications and interactions related to the member's care coordination, including messages, calls, and emails.
Diagnosis - The medical diagnosis or condition for which care coordination is being provided.
Progress Notes - Detailed notes documenting the progress and updates related to the care coordination efforts for the member.

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Capture initial information about the member and their healthcare needs

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Retrieve member's historical healthcare data from the system
Assign a case manager based on member's condition and historical data
Assess the complexity of the member's healthcare needs
Notify the relevant healthcare providers about the new care coordination case

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Assess the specific healthcare needs and create a care plan

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Retrieve care guidelines based on member's condition and historical data
Determine the initial care plan based on member's needs and available resources
Assign healthcare providers to the care team based on care plan
Notify the member about the assigned care team and initial care plan

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Coordinate the delivery of healthcare services and monitor progress

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Monitor the progress of care plan implementation and member's health status
Schedule follow-up appointments and interventions as needed
Review and approve any necessary modifications to the care plan
Notify all stakeholders about the progress and any changes in the care plan

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Evaluate the effectiveness of the care coordination and patient outcomes

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assess the impact of care coordination on patient's health outcomes and satisfaction
Generate reports on the effectiveness of care coordination and areas for improvement
Approve continuation or modifications to the care plan based on evaluation outcomes
Notify all stakeholders about the closure of the care coordination case

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Finalize the care coordination process and close the case

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Verify that all necessary steps in the care coordination process have been completed
Close the care coordination case and archive all related information
Notify all stakeholders about the closure of the care coordination case

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Claim Processing manages the end-to-end process of evaluating, processing, and adjudicating healthcare claims submitted by providers. It involves validating services rendered, determining coverage, calculating reimbursement, and ensuring compliance with contractual and regulatory requirements to expedite claim resolution and payment.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Claim Processing manages the end-to-end process of evaluating, processing, and adjudicating healthcare claims submitted by providers. It involves validating services rendered, determining coverage, calculating reimbursement, and ensuring compliance with contractual and regulatory requirements to expedite claim resolution and payment.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The unique identifier for the claim submitted by the provider. This field captures the claim number, which is used for tracking and reference purposes throughout the claim processing lifecycle.

The name of the healthcare provider or facility that rendered the services being claimed. This field provides essential information about the service provider and is used for validation and verification purposes.
The date when the claim was received by the payer. This field indicates the date of submission and is crucial for tracking the timeliness of claim processing and adherence to regulatory requirements.
The total amount billed by the healthcare provider for the services rendered. This field captures the financial aspect of the claim and is used for reimbursement calculation and financial analysis.

The diagnosis or reason for the healthcare services provided, as documented by the healthcare provider. This field is critical for assessing the medical necessity and appropriateness of the services claimed.
Indicates whether the claim requires additional documentation or review. This field flags claims that need further scrutiny or information for processing and resolution.

The code that represents the specific healthcare service or procedure rendered, as documented by the healthcare provider. This field is used for claim validation and adjudication based on the services provided.

The status of the claim processing workflow, indicating the current stage or step in the evaluation and adjudication process. This field provides visibility into the progress of claim resolution and payment.
The date when the healthcare services were provided to the member. This field is essential for evaluating the timeliness and appropriateness of the services in relation to the claim submission date.

A detailed description of the healthcare services provided, including procedures, treatments, and any additional relevant information. This field helps in understanding the nature of the services rendered and is used for claim evaluation and adjudication.

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Capture necessary information to initiate the claim processing

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Validate provider details and credentials
Verify the healthcare services provided
Assess if the services are covered under the member's plan
Route the claim to an investigator for further review
Inform the provider about the claim initiation

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Evaluate the claim details and make a decision on reimbursement

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automatically calculate the reimbursement amount
Check for compliance with contractual and regulatory requirements
Authorize or deny the claim based on the evaluation
Route the approved claim for payment processing
Inform the member about the claim decision

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Initiate the payment process for approved claims

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Start the payment transaction process
Review and verify the payment information
Assess if the payment can be released based on the verification
Inform both the provider and member about the payment

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Perform audit and ensure compliance with regulations

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automate the audit process to ensure accuracy and compliance
Check for adherence to regulatory requirements
Assign a compliance officer to address any issues found

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Finalize the claim resolution and close the case

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assess if the claim can be marked as resolved
Authorize the release of the approved payment
Inform all relevant parties about the claim closure

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Appeals & Grievances handles member appeals and grievances related to coverage decisions, benefit denials, and quality of care issues. It includes the review, investigation, and resolution of disputes to ensure fair and timely outcomes, regulatory compliance, and member satisfaction.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Appeals & Grievances handles member appeals and grievances related to coverage decisions, benefit denials, and quality of care issues. It includes the review, investigation, and resolution of disputes to ensure fair and timely outcomes, regulatory compliance, and member satisfaction.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: A brief summary or description of the issue raised by the member in the appeal or grievance. This provides an initial understanding of the nature of the dispute and its impact on the member's healthcare coverage.
The member's unique identification number assigned by the healthcare insurance company. This field is used to link the appeal or grievance to the member's policy and coverage details.

The date when the healthcare insurance company received the appeal or grievance. This timestamp is important for establishing the starting point of the resolution process and meeting regulatory deadlines.
The date when the appeal or grievance was submitted by the member or their authorized representative. This information is crucial for tracking the timeliness of the response and resolution process.

The name and contact information of the member's authorized representative or legal guardian, if applicable. This data is necessary for communication and verification purposes during the appeals and grievances process.

The final decision or outcome of the appeal or grievance case, including any actions required by the healthcare insurance company, such as coverage reversal, additional benefits, or quality improvement measures. This field captures the result of the case review and its impact on the member's coverage and care.

The unique reference number assigned to the appeal or grievance case for internal tracking and reference. This identifier is used to link related documents, communications, and activities to the specific case.

The current status of the appeal or grievance case, indicating whether it is under review, pending additional information, in decision-making, or resolved. This field provides a quick overview of the case's progress and current state.

The category or type of appeal or grievance raised by the member, such as coverage denial, treatment authorization, or quality of care concerns. This classification helps in routing the case to the appropriate review and resolution channels.

The date when the appeal or grievance case was resolved, providing the timeline for reaching a decision and communicating the outcome to the member. This information is vital for measuring the timeliness of case resolution and member satisfaction.

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Capture necessary information to initiate the appeals and grievances process

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assign task to collect member's personal and policy details
Assign task to gather details of the appeal or grievance
Assess if the appeal or grievance is valid and within scope

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Review and investigate the appeal or grievance to understand the situation

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assign task to request further information if required
Assess the claim and investigate the circumstances
Check for compliance with regulations and policies
Inform stakeholders about the progress and status

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Make a decision and resolve the appeal or grievance

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Evaluate possible resolutions for the appeal or grievance
Authorize the proposed resolution
Automate the update of member records with the resolution

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Communicate the decision and resolution to the involved parties

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Send notification to the member about the decision and resolution
Inform the provider about the decision and resolution

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Conclude the appeals and grievances process

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automate archiving of the case and related documents
Send notification about the closure of the appeal or grievance

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Enrollment & Onboarding manages the process of enrolling new members into the healthcare insurance plan and onboarding them into the system. It includes eligibility verification, plan selection, documentation collection, and welcome communications to facilitate a smooth and efficient onboarding experience for new members.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Enrollment & Onboarding manages the process of enrolling new members into the healthcare insurance plan and onboarding them into the system. It includes eligibility verification, plan selection, documentation collection, and welcome communications to facilitate a smooth and efficient onboarding experience for new members.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: Contact Number: The primary contact number of the new member. This information is used for communication purposes and may include phone calls, SMS notifications, and other relevant interactions related to enrollment and onboarding processes.

Date of Birth: The date of birth of the new member. This information is essential for verifying the member's eligibility and determining appropriate coverage options within the healthcare insurance plan.

Email Address: The email address of the new member. This serves as a key communication channel for sending important updates, documents, and notifications regarding the enrollment and onboarding process within the healthcare insurance plan.

Member ID: The unique identifier assigned to the new member upon enrollment into the healthcare insurance plan. This identifier is used for tracking and referencing the member's information and activities within the system.

Member Name: The full name of the new member being enrolled into the healthcare insurance plan. This field is used to uniquely identify the member and ensure accurate enrollment and onboarding processes.
Address: The residential address of the new member. This information is used for correspondence, billing, and ensuring accurate delivery of plan-related documents and materials.

Documentation Status: The status of documentation submitted by the new member, including verification of identity, eligibility documents, and any additional paperwork required for enrollment and onboarding.

Enrollment Date: The date on which the new member officially enrolls in the healthcare insurance plan. This date is critical for tracking enrollment timelines and ensuring timely onboarding processes.
Plan Selection: The specific healthcare insurance plan selected by the new member. This field captures the details of the chosen coverage, benefits, and any additional options included in the plan.
Primary Care Physician: The name of the primary care physician chosen by the new member. This information is relevant for coordinating care and managing healthcare services within the insurance plan.

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Manages the initial enrollment and onboarding process for new members

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Capture member information
Verify member eligibility
Is member eligible for enrollment?
Enroll member in selected plan
Send welcome communication to new member

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Manages the documentation collection and verification process for new members

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Collect required documentation from member
Review and approve member documentation
Is documentation complete and accurate?
Update member records with documentation
Notify member of successful documentation submission

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Manages the selection and approval of the healthcare plan for new members

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assist member in plan selection
Review and approve member's selected plan
Is the selected plan suitable for the member?
Record member's selected plan in the system
Confirm member's plan selection

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Manages the scheduling and preparation of the onboarding process for new members

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Schedule onboarding session for member
Review and approve member's onboarding schedule
Is the scheduled onboarding session confirmed by the member?
Prepare materials for member's onboarding session
Send onboarding session details to member

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Manages the post-onboarding feedback and communication for new members

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Conduct member satisfaction survey
Is the member satisfied with the onboarding process?
Update member records with survey feedback
Send final welcome and next steps communication to member

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Utilization Review evaluates the medical necessity, appropriateness, and efficiency of healthcare services and treatments. It involves reviewing requests for services, conducting clinical reviews, and making coverage determinations to optimize resource utilization, ensure quality care, and control costs.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Utilization Review evaluates the medical necessity, appropriateness, and efficiency of healthcare services and treatments. It involves reviewing requests for services, conducting clinical reviews, and making coverage determinations to optimize resource utilization, ensure quality care, and control costs.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The unique identifier for the Utilization Review case
The member's identification number for reference and tracking
The member's name who is the subject of the Utilization Review
The healthcare provider's name requesting the Utilization Review
The date and time when the Utilization Review request was initiated
Comments or notes related to the Utilization Review case
The outcome or decision of the Utilization Review (e.g., approved, denied)
The reason for the Utilization Review request
The current status of the Utilization Review (e.g., pending, in progress, approved, denied)
The specific healthcare service or treatment under review

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Capture necessary information for the utilization review process

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assign a task to collect patient medical records for review
Assign a task to verify the credentials of the healthcare service provider
Automatically retrieve prior authorization information from the system
Assess if the requested healthcare service is medically necessary

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assign a task to review the proposed treatment plan
Assess if the proposed treatment is appropriate for the medical condition
Route the treatment plan for approval
Inform the healthcare service provider of the coverage decision

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Make coverage determination based on the clinical review

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Determine if the requested service is covered under the member's plan
Route for additional authorization if required
Assess if the service is efficient in terms of cost and resource utilization
Inform the member of the coverage determination

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Process the approved healthcare services for claims

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automatically generate the claim for the approved service
Route the generated claim for review and approval
Assess the accuracy of the generated claim
Inform the healthcare service provider of the claim status

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Conclude the utilization review process

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Route for final approval of the entire utilization review process
Inform the member of the final outcome of the utilization review

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Member Engagement & Education promotes member engagement and education through targeted outreach, communication, and educational campaigns. It aims to improve member understanding of benefits, encourage preventive care, and foster proactive healthcare decision-making for better health outcomes and satisfaction.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Member Engagement & Education promotes member engagement and education through targeted outreach, communication, and educational campaigns. It aims to improve member understanding of benefits, encourage preventive care, and foster proactive healthcare decision-making for better health outcomes and satisfaction.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The contact number at which the member can be reached. This could be a mobile number, landline number, or any other preferred contact number.
The email address of the member engaging with the healthcare insurance system. It is used for communication and outreach purposes.
The full name of the member engaging with the healthcare insurance system. It should include the first name, middle name (if applicable), and last name.
The member's unique identifier within the healthcare insurance system. It could be a policy number, member ID, or any other identifier used to link the member to their coverage and benefits.
The primary healthcare provider or physician responsible for the member's care. It includes the provider's name, contact information, and specialty.
The member's residential address, including street address, city, state, and ZIP code. It is used for location-based outreach and communication.
The date when the member's insurance coverage became effective. It is used to determine eligibility and benefits for the member.
The member's demographic information, such as age, gender, ethnicity, and marital status. It is used for targeted outreach and educational campaigns based on demographic factors.
The member's current health conditions, medical history, and any ongoing treatments. It helps in tailoring educational content and outreach based on the member's health needs.
The member's preferred language for communication and outreach. It helps in ensuring that educational materials and communications are provided in the member's preferred language.

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Capture necessary information to initiate the Member Engagement & Education process

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Retrieve member details from the database for personalized outreach
Assign a specialist to initiate member outreach
Assess if the member is actively enrolled in the health plan
Determine if member is due for preventive care services
Send targeted communication to the member regarding outreach

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Engage members with personalized outreach and educational campaigns

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assign educational materials to be sent to the member
Assess if the member requires additional support or resources
Distribute educational content to the member
Automatically update member's record based on engagement
Authorize follow-up contact based on member's response

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Encourage members to take proactive healthcare actions

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assess if the member has taken proactive healthcare actions
Send reminder to member for proactive healthcare actions
Authorize incentive for member's proactive healthcare actions
Automatically update member's incentive record
Assess member satisfaction with the process and outcomes

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Conduct follow-up and gather member feedback for continuous improvement

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assign a specialist to conduct follow-up with the member
Assess if the member has been successfully reached for follow-up
Send request to member for feedback on their experience

Authorize process improvement based on member feedback

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automatically generate reports on member engagement outcomes
Authorize conclusion of the Member Engagement & Education process
Send notification to stakeholders regarding process conclusion and outcomes

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Order ID Card enables healthcare members to request new identification cards from their healthcare payer. The process validates member eligibility, processes the request, and initiates the generation and delivery of ID cards, ensuring members have the necessary documentation to access their healthcare services.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Order ID Card enables healthcare members to request new identification cards from their healthcare payer. The process validates member eligibility, processes the request, and initiates the generation and delivery of ID cards, ensuring members have the necessary documentation to access their healthcare services.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The member's contact phone number where they can be reached for any follow-up regarding the ID card request.
The member's date of birth. This information is used to further verify the member's identity and eligibility for the ID card request.
The member's email address. This may be used to send confirmation of the ID card request and provide updates on the status of the request.
The member's full name as it appears on the insurance card. This field is used to identify the member and ensure that the correct ID card is issued.
The member's unique identification number assigned by the healthcare payer. This number is used to validate the member's eligibility and tie the request to the correct member record.
The address where the ID card should be mailed. This is the physical location where the member prefers to receive their ID card.
The preferred language for communication with the member. This information ensures that any correspondence related to the ID card request is in the member's preferred language.
The reason for the ID card request. This field captures the member's rationale for needing a new ID card, which may include loss, damage, or other reasons.
The status of the ID card request, indicating whether it is pending, approved, or completed. This field provides visibility into the current stage of the request processing.
The date when the ID card request was submitted by the member. This helps in tracking the timeline of the request and ensures timely processing.

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Check member's eligibility for ID card request
Assess if the member is eligible for ID card request
Assign request to a representative for processing
Authorize the issuance of the ID card
Assess if the ID card request is approved

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Initiate the generation and delivery of the ID card

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automatically create the ID card
Assign printing of the ID card to a service provider
Assess if the ID card has been successfully printed

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assess if the ID card has been successfully delivered
Inform member about the successful delivery of the ID card
Automatically update member's records upon successful delivery

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Conclude the ID card request process

Inform member about the conclusion of the ID card request

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Assign collection of feedback to a representative
Assess if feedback has been received from the member
Automatically analyze the collected feedback for insights

pyCandidateCaseTypes.pyDescription: Add Dependent enables healthcare members to enroll a dependent in their existing healthcare plan through their healthcare payer. This workflow ensures a seamless dependent enrollment experience while maintaining compliance with healthcare regulations and documentation requirements.

pyDCDInfo.pyDescription: Add Dependent enables healthcare members to enroll a dependent in their existing healthcare plan through their healthcare payer. This workflow ensures a seamless dependent enrollment experience while maintaining compliance with healthcare regulations and documentation requirements.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The date of birth of the dependent being enrolled in the healthcare plan. This field captures the specific date on which the dependent was born and is essential for verifying age and eligibility for coverage under the healthcare plan.

The full name of the dependent being enrolled in the healthcare plan. This field captures the complete legal name of the dependent as it appears on official documentation, such as birth certificates or legal identification.
The effective date of coverage for the enrolled dependent. This field captures the specific date from which the dependent's healthcare coverage becomes active under the member's plan.
The relationship of the dependent to the primary member. This field captures the familial or legal relationship between the dependent and the primary member, such as child, spouse, or legal ward.

The Social Security number of the dependent being enrolled in the healthcare plan. This field captures the unique identifier assigned to the dependent and is used for official record-keeping and identification purposes.

The date and time when the member submits the verification documents for the dependent enrollment. This field captures the precise timestamp of document submission to validate the timeline of the enrollment process.
The status of the enrollment request for the dependent. This field captures the current stage of the enrollment process, such as pending verification, under review, approved, or rejected.

The reason for rejection, if the enrollment request for the dependent is not approved. This field captures the specific reason or explanation for the rejection of the dependent enrollment, providing transparency to the member regarding the decision.

The type of verification document being submitted by the member to validate the dependent relationship. This field captures the specific type of document, such as birth certificate, adoption papers, or legal guardianship documentation, being provided as proof of relationship.

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Capture necessary information to initiate the dependent enrollment process

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Check member's eligibility to add a dependent to their healthcare plan
Task routed to the member to provide dependent's information
Assess if the dependent meets the eligibility criteria based on the member's relationship
Task routed to a healthcare agent to review and approve dependent enrollment documents
Inform the member about the status of the dependent enrollment application

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Validate and authenticate the provided dependent details

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Authenticate the dependent's identity using available records
Assess if all required documents for dependent enrollment are complete and accurate
Task routed to the member if any additional information or documentation is required
Task routed to a designated authority to approve the dependent enrollment
Inform the member about the validation status of the dependent enrollment application

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Enroll the dependent in the member's healthcare plan

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automatically update the member's healthcare plan to include the enrolled dependent
Task routed to the member to confirm the dependent's enrollment details
Assess and select the coverage options for the enrolled dependent
Notify the member about the successful enrollment of the dependent in their healthcare plan
Task routed to the healthcare provider to send a welcome kit to the newly enrolled dependent

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Review the entire dependent enrollment process for accuracy and compliance

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Conduct an automated audit of the dependent enrollment process for accuracy and compliance
Assess if the dependent enrollment process complies with healthcare regulations and documentation requirements
Task routed to a designated authority to authorize the final enrollment of the dependent
Inform the member about the successful completion of the dependent enrollment process
Task routed to the member to provide feedback on their dependent enrollment experience

pyCandidateStages.pyDescription: Finalize the dependent enrollment process and ensure all necessary actions are taken

pyCandidateStageSteps.pyDescription: Automatically generate healthcare ID cards for the enrolled dependent
Task routed to the member to confirm the finalization of the dependent's enrollment
Assess if a welcome call needs to be scheduled for the newly enrolled dependent
Notify the member about the summary of the dependent enrollment process
Task routed to the healthcare agent to close the dependent enrollment case

pyCandidateDataObjects.pyDescription: Represents the Member Data Object and holds attributes like Member ID, Name, Contact Information, Policy Details, and Coverage. It is ideally connecting to the Member Database and Policy Management System for real-time data synchronization.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The contact information for the member, including address, phone number, and email address.
Information about the member's coverage, such as in-network providers, co-pays, and deductibles.
The unique identifier for the member within the system, typically alphanumeric with a maximum length of 20 characters.
The full name of the member as it appears on their insurance policy, including first name, middle initial, and last name.
Details of the member's insurance policy, including plan type, coverage level, and effective date.
The member's date of birth in the format MM/DD/YYYY.
The date when the member's policy is set to expire or renew.
The member's gender, typically indicated as male, female, or non-binary.
The member's social security number or other government-issued identification number.
The date when the member's policy was last updated or modified.

pyCandidateDataObjects.pyDescription: Represents the Provider Data Object and holds attributes such as Provider ID, Name, Contact Information, Specialty, Network Affiliation, and Contract Details. It is ideally connecting to the Provider Directory and Contract Management System for real-time data synchronization.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: The contact information for the provider, including address, phone number, and email. It is a string of characters representing the provider's contact details.

Details of the contractual relationship between the provider and the healthcare insurance company, including terms and conditions. It is a string of characters representing the provider's contract details.
The network or group with which the provider is affiliated. It is a string of characters representing the provider's network affiliation.
Unique identifier for the provider within the healthcare network. It is a string of alphanumeric characters that distinguishes one provider from another.
The full name of the healthcare provider, including title and any suffixes. It is a string of characters representing the provider's name.
The area of medical expertise or specialization of the healthcare provider. It is a string of characters representing the provider's specialty.
The unique identifier for the provider within the external provider directory system. It is a string of alphanumeric characters that distinguishes one provider from another in the external system.
The date and time when the provider's information was last updated in the system. It is a specific point in time and includes both date and time components.
Additional notes or comments related to the provider, such as specific preferences or special considerations. It is a string of characters providing additional information about the provider.
The date and time when the provider was added to the healthcare network. It is a specific point in time and includes both date and time components.

pyCandidateDataObjects.pyDescription: Represents the Inquiry Data Object and holds attributes like Inquiry ID, Type, Status, Member/Provider ID, Timestamp, and Resolution Details. It is ideally connecting to the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) System and Case Management System for tracking and resolution.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: Unique identifier for the inquiry, used for tracking and reference purposes. It is a combination of letters and numbers and has a maximum length of 20 characters.
Unique identifier for the member or provider associated with the inquiry. It is a combination of letters and numbers and has a maximum length of 20 characters.
Details of the resolution for the inquiry, including actions taken and outcomes. It is a textual field with a maximum length of 1000 characters.
Status of the inquiry, whether it's open, in progress, on hold, or resolved. It is a textual field with a maximum length of 50 characters.
Date and time when the inquiry was initiated or received. It includes both date and time components.
Indicates the type of inquiry, whether it's related to member coverage, claims, benefits, or general inquiries. It is a textual field with a maximum length of 100 characters.
Email address of the member or provider associated with the inquiry. It is a textual field with a maximum length of 100 characters and follows the standard email format.
First name of the member or provider associated with the inquiry. It is a textual field with a maximum length of 50 characters.
Last name of the member or provider associated with the inquiry. It is a textual field with a maximum length of 50 characters.
Phone number of the member or provider associated with the inquiry. It is a textual field with a maximum length of 20 characters and follows the standard phone number format.

pyCandidateDataObjects.pyDescription: Represents the Knowledge Base Data Object and holds attributes like Article ID, Title, Content, Category, and Tags. It is ideally connecting to the Knowledge Management System and Content Management System for storing and retrieving relevant information.

pyCandidateFields.pyDescription: Unique identifier for the article within the knowledge base. It is a system-generated alphanumeric code that distinguishes one article from another.
The category under which the knowledge base article falls, helping to organize and classify articles for easy retrieval and navigation.
The main content of the knowledge base article, containing detailed information, instructions, or explanations.
Keywords or tags associated with the knowledge base article, aiding in search and retrieval of relevant articles based on specific topics or themes.
The title of the knowledge base article, providing a brief summary of the content and purpose of the article.
The author or contributor of the knowledge base article, providing attribution and accountability for the article's content.
The language in which the knowledge base article is written, providing language-specific metadata for multilingual support.
The date and time when the knowledge base article was created or last modified, providing historical context for the article's content.
The source or origin of the knowledge base article, specifying where the information was sourced or originated from.
The status of the knowledge base article, indicating whether it is published, draft, archived, or pending review.

pyCandidatePersonas.pyDescription: The member service representative responsible for handling member inquiries, providing assistance with claims, benefits, and eligibility, and guiding members through the self-service options available in the application.
The healthcare provider interacting with the application to check patient eligibility, submit and track claims, and communicate with the payer's customer service regarding billing and reimbursement.

The customer service manager utilizing the application to monitor agent performance, track service level agreements, and optimize the utilization of AI-powered task suggestions and coaching for the team.
The prospective member exploring the application to understand available insurance plans, coverage options, and seeking assistance in the enrollment process.
